abstract: The police arrested a 23-year-old Queens man on Friday for stealing an iPhone earlier in the week - and they found him with the aide of an app.
snippet: The police arrested a 23-year-old Queens man on Friday for stealing an iPhone earlier in the week - and they found him with the aide of an app.
lead_paragraph: The police arrested a 23-year-old Queens man on Friday for stealing an iPhone earlier in the week - and they found him with the aid of an app.

headline.main: Want to Catch a Thief? There's an App for That
